trans-unit.source: To implement a custom upgrade acceptor, inherited from this <see langword="abstract" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: 實作繼承自這個 <see langword="abstract" /> 基底類別 (Base Class) 的自訂升級接受器。

trans-unit.source: An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
trans-unit.target: 資料流升級的一個範例，就是直接在傳輸資料流的上方建立壓縮資料流。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會搭配 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> 使用，以實作自訂資料流升級。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 如需升級程序的詳細說明，請參閱 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 要升級的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Upgrades the transport stream and returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: 升級傳輸資料流，並且傳回升級的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: 傳回升級的資料流。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to wrap the existing transport stream by providing additional capabilities; for example, a compressing stream.
trans-unit.target: 透過提供其他功能 (例如，壓縮資料流)，這個方法便可以用來包裝現有的傳輸資料流。

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 要升級的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the <see langword="AcceptUpgrade" /> call has completed.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see langword="AcceptUpgrade" /> 呼叫已完成時，所要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: State information for the <see langword="AcceptUpgrade" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="AcceptUpgrade" /> 呼叫的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade(System.IO.Stream)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade(System.IO.Stream)" /> 的非同步版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a result code that is passed into EndAcceptUpgrade to access the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: 傳回傳入 EndAcceptUpgrade 以存取所升級資料流的結果碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A> 的備註。

trans-unit.source: The type of content to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的內容型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the upgrade requested is supported by this upgrade acceptor.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個升級接受器是否支援要求的升級。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this kind of upgrade is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援這種升級，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The developer can inspect the requested content type and determine whether the resulting upgrade can be performed by this upgrade acceptor.
trans-unit.target: 開發者可以檢查要求的內容型別，並判斷所產生的升級是否可以由這個升級接受器執行。

trans-unit.source: This content type comes from the `GetNextUpgrade` method on the matching upgrade initiator.
trans-unit.target: 這個內容型別來自對應升級啟動器上的 `GetNextUpgrade` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The IAsyncResult returned from <see langword="BeginAcceptUpgrade" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see langword="BeginAcceptUpgrade" /> 傳回的 IasyncResult。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade(System.IO.Stream)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade(System.IO.Stream)" /> 的非同步版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: 傳回升級的資料流。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A> 的備註。
